meanings.sent1: The artist misrendered the landscape by painting the sky green instead of blue.
meanings.sent2: She misrendered the song lyrics by singing the wrong words.
meanings.sent3: The chef misrendered the recipe by adding salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: His misrendered map led us to the wrong destination.
meanings.sent5: The student misrendered the math problem, getting the incorrect answer.

meanings.sent1: The misrendered painting had the colors all mixed up.
meanings.sent2: The misrendered document caused confusion among the readers.
meanings.sent3: The misrendered photo made everyone look like they had funny faces.
meanings.sent4: Her misrendered drawing looked like a strange creature.
meanings.sent5: The misrendered sculpture appeared distorted and strange.
